text: Pieology pizza was a real treat. It is a build your own pizza place. There is a really great variety of vegetables as well as meats. You can choose from several different crust styles, but check the board above your head. You can be charged ‚Ä¶More

text: Love the customizable and affordable pizza. Other places that let you customize your own pizza overcharge a lot. Here, we could choose any base, sauces and unlimited toppings. Loved it

name: Christine Banek
text: I love pieology.  As someone who loves random stuff on pizza, but hates paying a huge price per topping, this is for me.  They also have a pretty good pesto sauce.  Thin crust is very tasty and crisp, you can pick from a lot of toppings and ‚Ä¶More

name: Mitch Schott
text: First time in on a date night. They were out of the crust we wanted so they made two fresh ones just for our order. Everyone was very nice and the food was great full of flavour and just the right amount of toppings ( a lil light on the sauce) but all was delicious. Thanks

text: It was pretty good. And it's conveniently located. My fiance also like it. As did her kid. We will be back at some point

text: Pizza will NEVER be the same for me. It was delicious, fresh veggies, fresh meats, bold taste of spices and cheese. Omg! Next time my daughter wants pizza we are going here. Must eat here at least once! Friendly staff, well cooked and fast food. It's not overly greasy either.

text: I like this place so much better than it's competition, Pizza Studio. Pieology's crusts are much better. Their gluten free crust is like no other gluten free crust I've had. I think their oven makes all the difference. The service is always cool and they are always careful with gluten sensitive offers

text: Pieology has multiple crusts like Wheat, Gluten Free,  along with regular style. Great choices of toppings. I had the buffalo chicken pizza with additional meatballs on wheat crust. Great flavor and the crust was cooked nice and crisp.
